data.text: Na Naamani Sofar buae se,
“Ɛnsɛ sɛ woyi saa nsɛm yi ano ana?
Wo nsɛm hunu no bɛma nnipa ayɛ komm ana?
Woka kyerɛ Onyankopɔn se, ‘Me gyidi ho nni asɛm
Ao, anka mepɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn kasa,
na ommue nyansa mu ahintasɛm so nkyerɛ wo,
“Wubetumi ate Onyankopɔn anwonwade ase ana?
Ɛkorɔn sen ɔsoro, dɛn na wubetumi ayɛ?
Ne nsusuwii mu ware sen asase
“Sɛ ɔba de wo bɛto afiase
Ampa ara ohu nnipa nnaadaafo;
Nanso ogyimifo rentumi nyɛ onyansafo da
“Na sɛ wode wo koma ma no
sɛ wugyaa bɔne a wukura no mu
ɛno de, bɔne nni wo ho, wobɛma wo ti so;
Wo werɛ befi wʼahokyere,
Abrabɔ bɛhyerɛn asen owigyinae,
Wubenya bammɔ, efisɛ anidaso wɔ hɔ;
Wobɛda ahome, na obi renhunahuna wo,
Amumɔyɛfo ani befura,
